question:
Your friend asked you for some help for the preparation of a party that he/she is going to throw at his/her home. Write a letter to your friend asking:

*What can you help with?

*What will you bring for the party?

*When you have time to help.

Begin your letter with:

Dear..........,

Write at least 150 words.
text: I hope you are healthy and safe. I have received your letter yesterday. Today I am writing this letter to inform you that, I will help you with the preparation of a party you are going to arrange.

To embark with, firstly, I want to know that what kind of party is this, and how can I help you. Secondly, if you tell me what should I do, it will help me to think. Thirdly, I want to tell you that I have previous experience of decorating and I can also help you by sending some pictures of my earlier works. I never left a stone unturned to make my work perfect.

In addition, I would like to know that what should I bring to your party. Moreover, I want to know, do you need any materials which is not available in your area. Not only, I can purchase materials but also I can bring a cake as well.

Furthermore, my final examination is knocking on my door, from 15th January to 31st January. I hope you will understand my situation right now. However, after that ,dates I will be available to support you.
I hope you will select a date  when I will be free. After getting your letter my feelings are like I am over the moon. I hope to see you soon.
